scheduler.name: scx_lavd
scheduler.description: A sophisticated latency-aware scheduler implementing LAVD (Latency-criticality Aware Virtual Deadline) algorithm. It measures task latency criticality and uses virtual deadline scheduling with per-LLC domains, core type awareness, and NUMA awareness. Designed for gaming and interactive workloads on single CCX/socket systems.
scheduler.characteristics: latency criticality measurement, virtual deadline scheduling, per llc domains, core type awareness, numa awareness, autopilot mode, power profile integration

autopilot.description: Automatically decide power mode and CPU preferences

scheduler.limitations: Complex configuration, mainly targets single CCX/socket systems
scheduler.performance_profile: optimized for low latency and interactivity
